Interface MainPlayer

    GameObject, GameObjectWithPhysics, Player, PlayerBody, RigidBody, Serializable

    public interface MainPlayer
extends Player
    Interface used to represent the main player controlled by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • setDirection

        void setDirection​(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 direction)
        Sets the direction where the player will move towards in the next update.
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the player, if null is passed it will stop the player.
